mapper.insert: insert into bucket values ( seq_buc_idx.nextval, #{bucCusoIdx}, #{bucBread}, #{bucMain}, #{bucVegi}, #{bucCheese}, #{bucSource}, #{bucTopping}, #{bucSide}, #{bucIsSalad}, #{bucIsOvened}, #{bucSet}, #{bucCost}, #{bucDiscntRate}, #{bucKcal}, #{bucQuantity}, default )
mapper.select: select ingre_idx as ingreIdx, ingre_label as ingreLabel, ingre_type as ingreType, ingre_cost15 as ingreCost15, ingre_cost30 as ingreCost30, ingre_discnt_rate as ingreDiscntRate, ingre_kcal as ingreKcal, ingre_active as ingreActive, ingre_description as ingreDescription, ingre_filepath as ingreFilepath,ingre_reg_date as ingreRegDate from ingredients
